title: RawResponse
description: Represents a raw response associated with the questionnaire

questionnaireModelId.description: Unique id for the questionnaire model (model instrument)

surveyUnitId.description: Unique id for the survey unit

contextualId.description: Contextual id used by external system

mode.description: Collection mode associated with the questionnaire

isCapturedIndirectly.description: Indicates if questionnaire is captured indirectly

validationDate.description: Indicates the validation date of the questionnaire (null if partial)

data.description: Data associated with the questionnaire (lunatic format)
